what is the syllabus for clat 2025: The CLAT 2025 syllabus includes English Language, Current Affairs including General Knowledge, Legal Reasoning, Logical Reasoning, and Quantitative Techniques.
how many questions are in the english se: The English section typically has 28–32 comprehension-based questions.
give me last year\u2019s cut-off for nls: For CLAT 2024, the cut-off for NLSIU Bangalore was AIR 114 for General category.
how many total questions are there in cl: The CLAT UG exam has a total of 120 questions.
is there negative marking in clat: Yes, 0.25 marks are deducted for each wrong answer.
how do i apply for clat 2025: Applications are accepted on the official website: consortiumofnlus.ac.in.
what are the subjects in clat 2025: Subjects include English, Current Affairs including GK, Legal Reasoning, Logical Reasoning, and Quantitative Techniques.
how to register for clat exam: You can register for CLAT on the official website consortiumofnlus.ac.in during the application window.
which books are best for clat preparatio: Popular books include 'Word Power Made Easy' for English, 'Legal Aptitude for the CLAT and other Law Entrance Examinations' by A. P. Bhardwaj, and 'Universal’s CLAT Guide'.
can a 12th appearing student apply for c: Yes, students appearing for Class 12 exams are eligible to apply for CLAT.
when will clat 2025 be held: CLAT 2025 is expected to be held in December 2024. Check the official website for exact dates.
how much is the clat registration fee: CLAT registration fee is ₹4000 for General/OBC/PWD/NRI and ₹3500 for SC/ST/BPL candidates.
